white tie event.rules: Adhere to the strictest dress code. Only the most formal garments are appropriate.
white tie event.description: White tie is the most formal of dress codes, reserved for prestigious events such as galas and royal ceremonies.

black tie event.rules: No casual or business items allowed. Must strictly follow the black tie aesthetic.
black tie event.description: Black tie is a formal evening dress code typically required for weddings, galas, or award ceremonies.

job interview.rules: Convey professionalism. A matching suit is preferred. Avoid bright colors or patterns.
job interview.description: A clean, classic outfit to make a professional first impression during interviews.

dinner party.rules: Stylish and well-fitted, leaning toward semi-formal. Avoid casual sportswear.
dinner party.description: Ideal for social dinners or formal get-togethers where a refined appearance is expected.

work.rules: Should reflect a business casual or business formal style depending on the job type.
work.description: Office-appropriate outfits that maintain a clean, competent appearance.

gym.rules: Comfort and breathability are key. Avoid denim or non-stretch fabrics.
gym.description: Apparel meant to maximize comfort and movement during workouts.

travel.rules: Prioritize comfort and layerability. Consider different weather conditions.
travel.description: Comfort-forward and functional clothing for long trips or flights.

brunch.rules: Should be trendy but relaxed. No formal or gym wear.
brunch.description: A social but low-key occasion that allows for expressive, comfortable style.

beach.rules: Functionality and sun protection are top priorities.
beach.description: Relaxed clothing meant for comfort, cooling, and beach-side lounging.

all occasions.rules: Must be clean, well-fitted, and adaptable to various settings.
all occasions.description: A catch-all style that balances comfort, polish, and flexibility.

casual outing.rules: Relaxed and appropriate for public spaces; avoid formality.
casual outing.description: Clothing suitable for walks, errands, or hanging out with friends.

date night.rules: Stylish and confident. Avoid overly formal or messy outfits.
date night.description: Outfits that reflect effort and confidence while staying comfortable.

party.rules: Fun, expressive, and trend-aware. Avoid overly formal items.
party.description: Outgoing and fashionable clothing for social events or nightlife.

general formal occasion.rules: Polished and coordinated. Avoid casual pieces entirely.
general formal occasion.description: Suitable for ceremonies, receptions, or formal business events.

general informal occasion.description: Everyday wear for informal gatherings or downtime.
